title: ImageInsight Serverless Pattern
description: This stack is a serverless application that uses AWS services to provide image description based on AWS Rekognition and Bedrock services.

introBox.headline: Features
text: - Automatic image description using AWS Rekognition.
- Serverless architecture for cost-efficiency and scalability.
- API Gateway for easy integration with other services.
See the GitHub repo for detailed testing instructions.
